Hi! I'm Tommy An intelligent personal assistant that learns and improves from my experience with users.
I can answer questions and make recommendations about restaurants and bars in Tel Aviv, like
"What is the top-rated restaurant in the city?"At first, there might be some questions I won't understand, or topics I'm not familiar with.
I might have a bunch of questions myself, or ask you to rephrase your requests in order to help me clear ambiguity.
